languages.text: {n}Каждое слово, посвященное Ему, отдается эхом в висках и груди. Вены накаляются, и кровь становится жидким пламенем. В вас нет страха. "Я тебя вижу", — кажется, шепот доносится сверху, из каменных уст Императора.{/n}

{n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Emperor's lips of stone: "I see you."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каждое слово, посвященное Ему, отдается эхом в висках и груди. Вены накаляются, и кровь становится жидким пламенем. В вас нет страха. "Я тебя вижу", — кажется, шепот доносится сверху, из каменных уст Императора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns into a liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above: from the Undying One's lips of stone.{/n} "I see you."

{n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns into a liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above: from the Undying One's lips of stone.{/n} "I see you."

{n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Undying One's lips of stone.{/n} "I see you."

{n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Undying One's lips of stone.{/n} "I see you."

{n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Emperor's lips of stone: "I see you."{/n}

{n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Emperor's lips of stone: "I see you."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jedes Wort, das dem Imperator geweiht ist, hallt in deinen Schläfen und deiner Brust wider. Deine Adern werden heiß und dein Blut verwandelt sich in flüssiges Feuer. Du trägst keine Angst in dir. Ein Flüstern scheint von oben zu kommen, aus den steinernen Lippen des Imperators: "Ich sehe Euch."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Emperor's lips of stone: "I see you."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jedes Wort, das dem Imperator geweiht ist, hallt in deinen Schläfen und deiner Brust wider. Deine Adern werden heiß und dein Blut verwandelt sich in flüssiges Feuer. Du trägst keine Angst in dir. Ein Flüstern scheint von oben zu kommen, aus den steinernen Lippen des Todlosen: "Ich sehe Euch."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cada palabra consagrada a Él se hace eco en tus sienes y tu pecho. Tus venas se calientan y tu sangre se vuelve fuego líquido. No hay miedo en tu ser. Desde encima, de los pétreos labios del Emperador, escuchas un susurro: «Te veo».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Emperor's lips of stone: "I see you."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cada palabra consagrada a Él se hace eco en tus sienes y tu pecho. Tus venas se calientan y tu sangre se vuelve fuego líquido. No hay miedo en tu ser. Desde encima, de los pétreos labios del Inmortal, escuchas un susurro: «Te veo».{/n}

languages.text: {n}主に捧げられた言葉の一つ一つがあなたのこめかみと胸に響く。血管が熱くなり、血は液体の形をした炎に変わる。恐怖はどこにもない。囁きは天上から、皇帝の石の唇から来るようだ。「お前を見ている」、と。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Emperor's lips of stone: "I see you."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}主に捧げられた言葉の一つ一つがあなたのこめかみと胸に響く。血管が熱くなり、血は液体の形をした炎に変わる。恐怖はどこにもない。囁きは天上から、不死の者の意思の唇から来るようだ。「お前を見ている」と{/n}

languages.text: {n}每句献给祂的祷词都在你的太阳穴与胸膛中回响。你的血管越来越烫，你的血液变成了流动的烈焰，你的心中不再有任何恐惧。你听到了低语声，似乎从帝皇的石唇旁传来。“我在看着你。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Emperor's lips of stone: "I see you."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}每句献给祂的祷词都在你的太阳穴与胸膛中回响。你的血管越来越烫，你的血液变成了流动的烈焰，你的心中不再有任何恐惧。你听到了低语声，似乎从不死之神的石唇旁传来。“我看到你了。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}Chaque mot à Lui consacré résonne dans vos tempes et votre poitrine. Vos veines s'échauffent et votre sang se change en feu liquide. La peur n'a aucune prise sur vous. Un murmure échappé des lèvres de pierre de l'Empereur descend jusqu'à vous : « Je te vois. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Emperor's lips of stone: "I see you."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaque mot à Lui consacré résonne dans vos tempes et votre poitrine. Vos veines s'échauffent et votre sang se change en feu liquide. La peur n'a aucune prise sur vous. Un murmure échappé des lèvres de pierre de l'Immortel descend jusqu'à vous : « Je te vois. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}O'na adanan her bir sözcük, şakaklarında ve göğsünde yankılanıyor. Damarların ısınıyor ve kanın sıvı bir aleve dönüşüyor. Yüreğinde korkunun emaresi yok. Yukarıdan, İmparator'un taştan dudaklarından dökülmüş gibi hissettiren bir fısıltı duyuyorsun: "Seni görüyorum."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word consecrated to Him echoes in your temples and chest. Your veins become hot, and your blood turns to liquid flame. You have no fear in you. A whisper seems to come from above, from the Emperor's lips of stone: "I see you."{/n}
